about.mission: Driving efficiency and innovation in accounting operations through technology and process optimization.
about.whatWeDo: We streamline financial workflows, implement automation solutions, and create tools that empower Netflix's accounting teams.
about.impact: From reducing manual processes to building innovative solutions, we're transforming how Netflix handles accounting operations.

projects.title: Workflow Automation System
projects.description: Building automated workflows to reduce manual data entry and improve accuracy.

completed.title: Invoice Processing Tool
completed.description: Automated invoice processing system that reduced processing time by 70%.
completed.impact: Saved 20+ hours per week across the accounting team.

videos.title: Introduction to AOWI Tools
videos.description: Overview of our team's tools and how to use them effectively.
